subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: The University of Phoenix Stadium, site of Super Bowl XLII, is one of the anchors of a sports complex that has sprouted in the last decade and is changing the character of the community.
snippet: The University of Phoenix Stadium, site of Super Bowl XLII, is one of the anchors of a sports complex that has sprouted in the last decade and is changing the character of the community.
